Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
EnvironmentAndRigidBodyStores all rigid body spheres and boundary and manages collisions of fluids with rigid body spheres and Boundary Box
ExportWrites the simulation data on a specified path as geo files
FluidParticleStores all attributes for a fluid for use with SPH
GLWindowManagement of entities required of simulation and visualization of fluids
IntegrateHandles integration to find next position and velocity of particles
MainWindowAll the UI extended from MainWindow.ui and our GLWindow
ParticleBase particle class to all others, it is used and extended to represent fluid and passive rigid bodies
RenderManages visulisation of simulation data generated by the sphSolver
SimulationParametersReads the values from the XML file and intialises the fluid solver
SpatialHashingImplements spatial hashing for the search of fluid particle neighbours
SPHSolverCreates fluid particles and perform SPH fluid simulation at every iteration
